message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with, Bob. Fair and simple.
I'm willing to give you 400000, but I think I deserve a bit more for taking the lead on this negotiation.  What do you think?
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, Bob. You're getting closer to your desired share, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. Let's see if you can do better than this.
